com.loicfrance.library.utils

Class SettingsSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.loicfrance.library.utils.SettingsSet

  • public abstract class SettingsSet
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Loic France on 23/09/2015. the pseudo-interface class to use with Settings. Inside, put all of your preference keys as String constants. Example : 
    {@code

public class MySettingsSet extends SettingsSet {

    public static final String CONDITIONS_ACCEPTED = "conditions_accepted";
    public static final String HAIR_COLOR          = "color";
    public static final String WEIGHT              = "weight";
    public static final String SIZE                = "size";
    public static final String NAME                = "name";
    public static final String AGE                 = "age";
